code: Require Import RelationClasses Morphisms List Lia Init.Nat Setoid.
From Undecidability.HOU Require Import std.std calculus.calculus unification.unification.
From Undecidability.HOU Require Import third_order.pcp third_order.encoding.
Definition MPCP' '(c, C) := exists I, I ⊆ nats (length C) /\ hd c ++ @concat symbol (select I (heads C)) = tl c ++ concat (select I (tails C)).
Lemma MPCP_MPCP' c C: MPCP (c, C) <-> MPCP' (c, c::C).
Definition redtm (w: word) (W: list word): exp X := lambda lambda (enc 0 1 w) (AppR (var 2) (Enc 0 1 W)).
Definition redctx (n: nat) := [Arr (repeat (alpha → alpha) n) alpha].
Lemma redtm_typing w W: redctx (length W) ⊢(3) redtm w W : (alpha → alpha) → (alpha → alpha) → alpha.
eapply AppR_ordertyping;[ eapply Enc_typing|]; simplify; econstructor; cbn; simplify; eauto.

Program Instance MPCP'_to_U P : orduni 3 X := { Gamma₀ := redctx (length (snd P)); s₀ := redtm (hd (fst P)) (heads (snd P)); t₀ := redtm (tl (fst P)) (tails (snd P)); A₀ := (alpha → alpha) → (alpha → alpha) → alpha; H1₀ := redtm_typing (hd (fst P)) (heads (snd P)); H2₀ := redtm_typing (tl (fst P)) (tails (snd P)); }.
Lemma MPCP'_U3 P: MPCP' P -> OU 3 X (MPCP'_to_U P).
destruct P as [c C]; intros (I & Sub & EQ).
destruct x as [| [|]]; try discriminate; cbn.
Lemma U3_MPCP' P: OU 3 X (MPCP'_to_U P) -> MPCP' P.
specialize (T1 0 (Arr (repeat (alpha → alpha) (length C)) alpha)); mp T1; eauto.
eapply ordertyping_preservation_under_renaming with (delta := add 2) (Delta0 := alpha :: alpha :: Delta) in T1.
eapply main_lemma with (u := 0) (v := 1) in T1 as (I & S & H); eauto.
all: unfold funcomp; cbn -[add]; rewrite !ren_plus_base, !ren_plus_combine; change (1 + 1) with 2.
specialize (H (heads C)) as H1; mp H1; simplify; eauto.
specialize (H (tails C)) as H2; mp H2; simplify; eauto.
destruct H1 as [t' [-> H1]], H2 as [t'' [-> H2]].
all: intros s; try eapply H1; try eapply H2.
Lemma MPCP_U3 X: MPCP ⪯ OU 3 X.
